title: Mi an khenbeh chu in en chuan nunna a awm
lyrics:
Mi an khenbeh chu inn en chuan nunna a awm,
Tun thleng hiann nunna chu a la awm;
Thinga Mi an khenbeha chu en rawh u,
Mi sualte u, chhandamin awm r'u.

En r'u, in nung ang,
Mi an khenbeh chu in en chuan nunna a awm,
Tun thleng hian nunna chu a la awm.

Engah nge Isua sual mawh phurin a lo awm,
I tana tuar a nih si loh chuan?
Engah nge faina thisen chhuakin a awm,
I leibat pek a nih si loh chuan?

Pathianin a sawmna che hi ringhlel suh la,
Tih leh tur dang a awm tawh lo va;
He khawvel tawpah a lo lang leh ang a,
A hnathawh chu a ti zo tawh ang.
